articles.content: Kroger, the grocery chain that owns QFC and Fred Meyer, said Friday it will offer employees a one-time $100 payment after they receive the coronavirus vaccine. Employees who cannot get the vaccine fo… [+1745 chars]

articles.title: Brent oil hits $60 for first time in a year (NYSEARCA:XLE) - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: The S&P energy sector (XLE +3.1%) sprints to the top of today's standings as Brent crude oil (CO1:COM) tops $60/bbl for the first time in more than a year, helped by supply cuts...
